alert.note: Alert for Bayfield; Sawyer (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 01 at 1:58AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL BAYFIELD AND NORTH CENTRAL SAWYER COUNTIES THROUGH 215 AM CDT... At 158 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Round Lake, or 7 miles north of Chippewa Flowage West, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chippewa Flowage West, Chippewa Flowage East, Round Lake, Namekagon, Little Round Lake, Spider Lake, Ghost Lake, Lost Land Lake, Moose Lake Sawyer County, and Teal Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
